sources.title: Dark Tales Of Japan
sources.description: Dark Tales of Japan  ( 日本のこわい夜 ,  Nihon no Kowai Yoru )  is a 2004 made-for-TV  film anthology  of five short  horror  stories, directed by five notable  Japanese   film directors , which are told through a mysterious old lady in kimono on a late-night bus travelling on a long isolated mountain road.
